    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      voidconfigurationChange(String state!)

      will be called by the widget when the configuration has changed and will apply the state to the object

      StringgetState()

      returns the current state of the component

      voidonStateChange(BBjEvent ev!)

      get called when the state of the component changes. the widget then has to react to the state change

      voidrefreshConfiguration()

      refires the configuration event on the widget which reapplies the current state
